title: [2.13.0.Final]: /q/dev UI throws an error when navigating to "Configuration" -> "Config Editor"
body:
### Describe the bug

/q/dev UI throws an StringIndexOutOfBoundsException-error when navigating to "Configuration" -> "Config Editor"
Same behaviour like described in https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/27345

The "Configuration" -> "Dev Services" work as expected

### Expected behavior

html page w/ config options 

### Actual behavior

error message:

java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: Range [1, 0) out of bounds for length 1

	at java.base/jdk.internal.util.Preconditions.checkFromToIndex(Preconditions.java:349)

	at io.quarkus.qute.EvaluatorImpl.evaluate(EvaluatorImpl.java:72)
	at io.quarkus.qute.ResolutionContextImpl$ChildResolutionContext.evaluate(ResolutionContextImpl.java:87)
	at io.quarkus.qute.LoopSectionHelper.resolve(LoopSectionHelper.java:44)

	at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:1589)
Resulted in: java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
	at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.DirectMethodHandleAccessor.invoke(DirectMethodHandleAccessor.java:119)
	... 61 more
Resulted in: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Reflection invocation error

	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.whenComplete(CompletableFuture.java:2357)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.whenComplete(CompletableFuture.java:144)
	... 32 more
Resulted in: java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: io.quarkus.qute.TemplateException
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.encodeThrowable(CompletableFuture.java:332)
	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniApplyNow(CompletableFuture.java:674)

	at java.base/java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.thenApply(CompletableFuture.java:144)
	... 31 more

### How to Reproduce?

Steps to reproduce the behaviour

1. Go to code.quarkus.io
2. add extensions: quarkus-resteasy-reactive, quarkus-hibernate-orm-panache, quarkus-jdbc-postgresql, quarkus-smallrye-openapi, quarkus-flyway
3. download zip
4. extract and open in IDE
5. quarkus dev --clean
6. open "Dev UI" -> "Config Editor"

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin Toms-MBP-2022.fritz.box 21.6.0 Darwin Kernel Version 21.6.0: Mon Aug 22 20:19:52 PDT 2022; root:xnu-8020.140.49~2/RELEASE_ARM64_T6000 arm64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "19" 2022-09-20 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-19+36 (build 19+36) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-19+36 (build 19+36, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.13.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven home: /Users/xxx/.m2/wrapper/dists/apache-maven-3.8.6-bin/67568434/apache-maven-3.8.6 Java version: 19, vendor: Eclipse Adoptium, runtime: /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/temurin-19.jdk/Contents/Home Default locale: en_AT, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "12.6", arch: "aarch64", family: "mac"

### Additional information

_No response_
